## LineItem.currency property

Three-letter [ISO currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html)<!-- -->, in lowercase. Must be a [supported currency](https://stripe.com/docs/currencies)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
currency?: string;
```
